content.question: The decision to allow African American enlistment in the Union Army during the Civil War was most directly influenced by which of the following?

choices.label: The passage of the Thirteenth Amendment
Confederate efforts to recruit African American soldiers
Staff and labor shortages in the Union Army
The racial integration of the Union military

content.answer: Staff and labor shortages in the Union Army

topic.text: 2.23: The Civil War and Black Communities

skill.text: 1.B: Identify and explain the context of a specific event, development, or process.
